game.title: The Lost Village
game.objective: Finding the lost village and speaking to its elder.
game.description: The village has been lost in the forest for years, and its elder has requested our help in finding it.
game.reward: 200 gold pieces and a magical map

task.objective: Meet with the village elder's representative in the forest.
task.description: The representative will meet us near a giant oak tree. They have information about the village's location.
task.location: Giant Oak Tree, Forest of Wonders

task.objective: Explore the forest and find the lost village.
task.description: The village is hidden behind a waterfall. We need to explore the area around the giant oak tree to find it.
